stock

Class StockMarket

  • java.lang.Object
    • stock.StockMarket

  • public class StockMarket
extends Object
    The StockMarket is merely a secondary storage for any incoming StockRecords.

    Any algorithm or filter that connects to TRDR can, if they so choose, request whatever available data the StockMarket has before they subscribe to a stream. The stock market database will naturally become quite large as time goes on. This is George's area.

    Author:
    Kyle
    See Also:
    StockRecord
